Description.val:
The Special Projects program modifies and/or replaces obsolete special mission equipment and integrates Quick Reaction Capability (QRC) on P-3 and P-8 aircraft.  Procurements vary in each fiscal year and include common Navy systems for increased capability, reduced operator workload and common logistics, procurement of special mission equipment as directed by the Chief of Naval Operations and other emerging requirements.  Active Primary Aircraft Authorized inventory is 5 aircraft.

The government is the Lead System Integrator for Hardware and Software upgrades on the aircraft.

Justification.val:
For FY20 these modification efforts continue to replace obsolescence intelligence collection equipment in five P-3 Special Project aircraft by procurement of special mission equipment as directed by the Chief of Naval Operations.

OCO: 
FY2020 $3.498M OCO Funds will install new collection capabilities required by the COCOM on SPA aircraft.  Specific operational details can be provided in a classified forum.

Name.@footnote: P-3A In/Out for Total Prior Years should be blank, set to 1 as a workaround.

ImplementationMethodName.val: [none specified]:: Installation Name: Mission Unique Equipment

Description.val:
DESCRIPTION/JUSTIFICATION:

For FY20 these modification efforts continue to replace obsolescence intelligence collection equipment in five P-3 Special Project aircraft by procurement of special mission equipment as directed by the Chief of Naval Operations. 

The government is the Lead System Integrator for Hardware and Software upgrades on the aircraft.

FY2020 $3.498M OCO Funds will install new collection capabilities required by the COCOM on SPA aircraft.  Specific operational details can be provided in a classified forum.

DEVELOPMENT STATUS/MAJOR MILESTONES:  Not Applicable
                                                                                                                        NOTES:
1) FY2018 OCO will fund installs in FY2019
2) FY2019 OCO will fund installs in FY2020
